title: Entity Type
description: Resource that represents a custom entity type. These type can be configured to have any combination of fields, permitting businesses to create unique and complex ways to model their data.

descriptionTranslation.description: Translations of the description for different locale codes.

displayNameTranslation.description: Translations of the displayName for different locale codes.

enabled.description: A flag that determines if the entity type is enabled.

field.description: List of fields in the entity type's schema.

required.description: Flag that determines if the field value is required.

pluralDisplayName.description: Plural display name for multiple entities of this type.

pluralDisplayNameTranslation.description: Translations of the pluralDisplayName for different locale codes.

localeCode.description: The locale code of the translation.
